content: In a Form Filling room, the main link is valid for an unlimited time period.

comment.text: "In a Form Filling room, the main link is valid for an unlimited time period. This translation key displays the explanation for this setting in the Edit Link Panel, likely on a button or label."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "vaxt məhdudiyyəti olmadan" translates to "without time limit" which is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express "unlimited time period". A more fluent translation would be something like "müddəti bitməyən" or "məhdudiyyətsiz".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Forma Doldurma otağında əsas link müddəti bitməyən etibarlıdır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ລິ້ງຕົ້ນເອກສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ຕະຫຼອດເວລາ" while generally conveying the meaning, isn't as precise as the English "valid for an unlimited time period."  "ລິ້ງຕົ້ນເອກ" translates to 'main link' which is correct, but 'ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ຕະຫຼອດເວລາ'  literally means 'can be used all the time' and doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'unlimited time'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງຕົ້ນເອກສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ຢ່າງບໍ່ມີເວລາໝຸດ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is technically correct but slightly awkward and doesn't flow naturally in Polish. The phrasing 'link główny jest ważny przez czas nieograniczony' sounds stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: W pokoju do wypełniania formularzy główny link jest ważny bezterminowo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, the use of 'przez czas nieograniczony' is a bit verbose. It could be simplified.

The translation "V sobi za izpolnjevanje obrazcev je glavna povezava veljavna neomejeno časovno obdobje" is a literal translation and sounds unnatural in Slovenian. A more natural phrasing would emphasize the indefinite duration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: V sobi za izpolnjevanje obrazcev je glavna povezava veljavna za nedoločen čas.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'main link' is too literal and might not convey the intended meaning in Serbian. 'Main link' suggests a specific link, whereas the English implies the validity extends to the entire form-filling process.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: У соби за попуњавање образаца, приступ облику важи неограничено.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, using 'приступ облику' improves clarity and reads more naturally than 'главни линк важи'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No change needed if 'главни линк важи' is preferred; however, 'приступ облику' is recommended for better readability.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'діє необмежений період часу' (acts unlimited period of time) is a bit literal and awkward. A more natural phrasing would be 'дійсний без обмеження терміну' (valid without a time limit) or 'дійсний безстроково' (valid indefinitely).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: У кімнаті заповнення форм основне посилання дійсний без обмеження терміну.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '主链接的有效期是不限的' is technically correct but sounds a bit awkward and less natural in Chinese. A more common and natural phrasing would be '主链接永久有效' or '主链接有效时间无限'.
